timeline.message:
t push :Merge branch 'master' of github.com:MarcusSorealheis/lucene-solr

* 'master' of github.com:MarcusSorealheis/lucene-solr:
  Fix typo in `cloud-scripts` path

Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master'

* upstream/master:
  SOLR-14237: Fix HDFS nightly test failure
  LUCENE-9278: concatenate paths for sourcepath using path separator rather than whitespace (which causes invalid option to be passed to javadoc).
  LUCENE-9333: Add gradle task to compile changes.txt to a html (#1468)
  update CHANGES for #807
  Fix tests to survive nightly runs with many documents
  SOLR-14173: Don't use JQuery-Slim as it breaks the sidebar sub-menu system.
  SOLR-14237: A new panel with security info in admin UI's dashboard
  SOLR-14237: A new panel with security info in admin UI's dashboard
  LUCENE-7788: fail precommit on unparameterised log messages and examine for wasted work/objects
  SOLR-14173: Change left nav item highlighting to fix menu jumpiness when hovering/selecting
  LUCENE-9349: TermInSetQuery should use consumeMatchingTerms in visit() (#1465)
  LUCENE-9089: update FST usage example

Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master'

* upstream/master: (218 commits)
  LUCENE-9412 Do not validate jenkins HTTPS cert
  LUCENE-8962: add ability to selectively merge on commit (#1552)
  Replace DWPT.DocState with simple method parameters (#1594)
  LUCENE-9402: Let MultiCollector handle minCompetitiveScore (#1567)
  SOLR-14574: Fix or suppress warnings in solr/core/src/test (part 2)
  SOLR-14561 CoreAdminAPI's parameters instanceDir and dataDir are now validated (#1572)
  SOLR-14532: Add *.iml files to gitignore
  SOLR-14577: Return BAD REQUEST when field is missing in terms QP (#1588)
  SOLR-14574: Fix or suppress warnings in solr/core/src/test (part 1)
  remove debug code
  LUCENE-9408: roll back only called once enforcement
  LUCENE-8962: Allow waiting for all merges in a merge spec (#1585)
  SOLR-14572 document missing SearchComponents (#1581)
  LUCENE-9359: Avoid test failures when the extra file is a dir.
  SOLR-14573: Fix or suppress warnings in solrj/src/test
  LUCENE-9353: Move terms metadata to its own file. (#1473)
  Cleanup TermsHashPerField (#1573)
  SOLR-14558: Record all log lines in SolrLogPostTool (#1570)
  LUCENE-9404: simplify checksum calculation of ByteBuffersIndexOutput
  LUCENE-9403: tune BufferedChecksum.DEFAULT_BUFFERSIZE
  ...

Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master'

* upstream/master: (90 commits)
  SOLR-14595: add AwaitsFix test to TestJsonFacetRefinement demonstrating problem, and work around to randomized testing in TestCloudJSONFacetSKGEquiv
  SOLR-14404: update was not working
  SOLR-14523: Enhance gradle logging calls validation: eliminate getMessage(). Added Gradle validation check.
  SOLR-14021: Deprecate HDFS support
  SOLR-14603: Update CHANGES.txt
  SOLR-14603: Upgrade Restlet to 2.4.3
  SOLR-14537: Fix gradle precommit failures
  SOLR-14610: ReflectMapWriter to use VarHandle instead of old legacy reflection (#1635)
  SOLR-10742: SolrCores.getNamesForCore is quite inefficient and blocks other core operations
  fix link and wordsmith a bit (#1642)
  SOLR-14358 respond to feedback on URLClassifyProcessorFactory (#1632)
  SOLR-14537: Improve performance of ExportWriter.
  SOLR-14561: Fix silly mistake in refguide link
  SOLR-14561: Adding upgrade notes for allowPaths (#1641)
  SOLR-14066: Deprecate DIH
  SOLR-14022: Deprecate CDCR
  SOLR-14588: Implement Circuit Breakers (#1626)
  Remove Redundant Import in TestContainerPlugin
  SOLR-14404: Unregister was not working for plugins with $path-prefix
  SOLR-14523: Enhance gradle logging calls validation: eliminate getMessage()
  ...

Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' * upstream/master: (45 commits) SOLR-14151 Make schema components load from packages (#1669) SOLR-13939: Extract any non-gradle related patches (deprecations, URL fixes, etc.) from gradle effort. Attmept to fix Windows disk full issues SOLR-14646: Add STEM notation support for the Ref Guide Add back-compat indices for 8.6.0 Sync CHANGES for 8.6.0 SOLR-13939: Extract any non-gradle related patches (deprecations, URL fixes, etc.) from gradle effort (thread leaks) DOAP changes for release 8.6.0 SOLR-14647 SOLR-14637 update CloudSolrClient examples to remove deprecated .Builder() method (#1670) SOLR-14244: Remove ReplicaInfo. SOLR-14635: re-enable test with better gatekeeping of expected 'ownership threads' and (nightly only) polling of 'locked/waiting threads' before making asserts Ref Guide: fix aliases.adoc TIP for proper conversion Harden TestBuildingUpMemoryPressure (#1662) SOLR-13939: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/SOLR-13939 SOLR-11262: XML writer implements writeMap and writeIterator (#1665) Ref Guide: fix documentation for forceElevation param Ref Guide: move allowPaths note into Security section for 8.6 Ref Guide: fix template to put list items inside a

element for consistent styling SOLR-13132: fix some small package visibility and javadoc glitches that were caught on backport by the java8/branch_8x precommit but slipped past the java11/master precommit SOLR-13132: JSON Facet perf improvements to support "sweeping" collection of "relatedness()" ...

timeline.bodyText: don't need this since deleteLocal will also call checkInZk?
timeline.author: madrob

timeline.bodyText:
do we use this for locking? no no no. we should be using zk versions for that.
I understand that the code may have been in place before, but we need to fix it then before we can add additional features on top of this. it will add so much trouble.
timeline.author: madrob

replies.bodyText: I need to research how to do this better. I did not like this portion of the change but could not find a reliable way to check because of eventual consistency.
replies.author: MarcusSorealheis

replies.bodyText:
@madrob This should be a separate ticket because this is used all over.
I've opened SOLR-14698
replies.author: noblepaul

replies.bodyText: thank you @noblepaul . I couldn't figure out a better way to do this other then simplifying the exception and conditional
replies.author: MarcusSorealheis

timeline.bodyText: please configure your IDE to not do this
timeline.author: madrob

replies.bodyText: Ok, I can fix this one.
replies.author: MarcusSorealheis

timeline.author: madrob

replies.bodyText: depends on which rig I'm on so probably not
replies.author: MarcusSorealheis

timeline.message: changing to package store so it's easier to search for.
